chat.msg: Welcome!
Move to the left towards the tiger, then go to the the parrot area
I see a starting point on the map. I will move to the left and I am now at the island with a tiger on it. Which direction should I go to reach the parrot area?
the left downward
I am now at the island with the parrot on the tree. What's the next step?
The next step is crossing the rock bridge towards the frog.
I see the three rocks leading to a new island. I will cross the rock bridge and I am now on the island with the frog. What should I do next?
Move towards the alligator on the left and use it to cross towards the elephant
I see the crocodile on the left. I will move towards it and use it to cross towards the elephant. I am now on the same big island with the elephant. What's the next step?
Cross the rock bridge towards the giraffe.
I am now crossing the rock bridge and I am on the island with the giraffe. What should I do next?
Cross the bridge downward towards the snake and the treasure will be there.
I am now crossing the bridge downward and I am on the island with the snake. I will move 2 steps to the east and I have found the treasure! *finished*

chat.msg: Welcome!
Please guide me.
Great! Let's start the adventure. Look around and tell me what you see.
I see a dog with purple spots.  I see another dog with apicnic basket and blanket. I see a deer on another island. I see some older people. I se a couple on bicycle.
That sounds exciting! Let's begin by heading west, towards the wooden bench. Let me know when you've reached it.
I'm at the wooden bench.

Perfect! Now, you need to go south, but before you reach the florist stand, make a left turn and cross the trail. The path will then lead you back towards the white dog. Let me know when you've made the turn.
I'm at the florist stand.
Oh, it seems like you missed the turn. That's alright. Go back to the white dog and we'll try again. Let me know when you're back at the dog.
I'm back at the white dog.

Great job! Now, let's try again. This time, head west from the white dog, cross the trail, and make a left turn towards the florist stand. Don't forget to u-turn left after reaching the stand. Let me know when you've reached the wooden branch crossing the river.
I reached the wooden branch.
Well done! Now, cross over the branch and continue southwards. You should come across another white dog next to a red and white checkered picnic. Let me know when you've reached there.
I'm there.
Fantastic! Now, look around and tell me what you see near the picnic.
I see a log towards the florist stand.

Lovely! Now, let's keep going. Head west from the picnic, making sure to touch the bowl of berries on the way. After that, continue to the west until you come across a wooden branch crossing the river again. Let me know when you've reached it.
I've reached the log.
Oops, it seems like you missed the wooden branch. No worries, let's head back to the red and white checkered picnic and try again. Let me know when you're back at the picnic area.
I'm back.

Great! Let's give it another try. From the picnic, head west and make sure to touch the bowl of berries. Then continue west until you reach the wooden branch crossing the river. Let me know when you've reached it.
I reached it.

Well done! Now, cross over the branch to the other side of the river, heading northward. As you cross, carefully avoid touching the green bush. Circle around it from the right side. Once you've circled the bush, you should find yourself near the florist stand. Let me know when you've reached there.
I reached the florist  stand

Fantastic! You're doing great! Now, turn left (west) and go below the florist stand. Keep going until you reach a big bridge with two people riding a bicycle. Let me know when you've reached the bridge.
reached it
Wonderful! Now, just past the bridge, you'll see two elderly people sitting on a bench reading newspapers. Take a moment to observe your surroundings and let me know what else you see near the bench.
I see a log and a deer.

Great observation! Now, let's continue the journey. Move a few steps south between the elderly people and the log. You'll then reach a green bush next to the end of the wooden branch. Let me know when you've reached there.
I reached the bush,
Excellent! Now, turn east and walk a few steps. What do you see in the distance?

chat.msg: Welcome!
Hello. Walk to the left and then go towards the trail avoiding the dog.
I see a tent to my north. I will walk to the left. Now I am facing west. Can you please clarify which way is "towards the trail"? And should I continue heading west after that?
it's near the dog but avoid it. Then head make right turn around the fire and avoid the mushrooms . Walk towards the telescope.

Thank you for the instructions. I see the dog sitting to my south. I will walk towards it but make sure to avoid it. Now I'm near the fire. Should I make a right turn and continue heading west, or should I go straight ahead towards the telescope?
Turn to where the trail is near the mushrooms.
Got it. I will turn to the right, away from the fire, and head towards the mushrooms. Now I am near the red mushrooms. I see a blue car to my south. Which direction should I go from here?
Take a left turn and go south but avoid the bush.
Understood. I will take a left turn and head south, making sure to avoid the bush. Now I'm walking south. Is there anything specific I should look out for or any other instructions?
Walk towards but avoid the telescope.
Got it. I will continue walking south but make sure to avoid the telescope. Now I'm facing the telescope. Should I continue walking south or is there a different direction I should take?
Go south then make a left turn, cross, the rocks  and reach the house.

Great. I will continue walking south and then make a left turn. Now I'm facing the rocks. I will cross the rocks and head towards the house. 

*Finished*

I have reached the wooden house. Thank you for your instructions!

chat.msg: Welcome!
Hello. Please tell me where to go.
Hello! Great to have you here. Let's start our adventure. Look around you and describe what you see near the palm trees.
I seee a dog south .
That's great, you spotted the dog! Now, facing the dog, go under the first tree on your left (southwest). Let me know when you're there.
I see a beach, a speaker and a tent to the northwest. I see two rocks to the south.
Wonderful! You have a keen eye. Now, turn right and continue walking until you reach a brown puppy. Let me know when you're near the puppy.
I reached the puppy.
Hello?
It stopped responding.

When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? To accommodate people who don't share the same language or language fluency.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? For social reasons; one language feels more appropriate.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? I can't think of a word in the current language.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? The word in the other language just fits better.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? It's an accident, or I don't realize I'm doing it.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? I'm more comfortable discussing the topic in the other language.

general_survey.answer: It's an odd one due to being of a mixed background.
